name: High Speed:Drift Racing 3
description:
High Speed:Drift Racing 3 is the best car racing game of this year as the user gets the chance to drive the most advance and fastest cars famous for motorsports. The user will start with the basic level car and in later stages the car will upgraded. This is world tour game so user will travel to various continents and compete with racers from all over the globe.
Features
1. Amazing gameplay and graphics
2. Super challenging levels
3. Many cars to drive and customize
4. Outclass touch and tilt controls
5. Addictive drifting game
